DistanceMetricUtils

DistanceMetricUtils

Static utility methods related to genetic distance metrics.

Functions
CalculateEuclideanCentroid
public static ConnectionGenes<double> CalculateEuclideanCentroid(
ReadOnlySpan<ConnectionGenes<double>> points
)

Calculates the L2/Euclidean centroid for the given set of points.

The Euclidean centroid is a central position within a set of points that minimizes the sum of the squared distance between each of those points and the centroid. As such it can also be thought of as being representative of a set of points.  In Euclidean space the centroid is obtained by calculating the componentwise mean over the set of points.

Parameter
points
ReadOnlySpan<ConnectionGenes<double>>

The set of points.

Returns

A new instance of ConnectionGenes{T}.
